memorycard: SD (Secure Digital) and UHS-I compliant SDHC and SDXC memory cards
wirelessfunction: Not in-built (Wireless Mobile Adapter WU-1a (optional): share images directly from the D5200 to a smartphone or tablet that runs on Android or iOS, or control the camera remotely via your device.)
speed: 1/4000 - 30 s in steps of 1/3 or 1/2 EV; Bulb; Time (requires optional ML-L3 remote control)
builtin: Yes - Auto, portrait, child, close up, night portrait, party/indoor, pet portrait, colour sketch: Auto flash with auto pop-up P, S, A, M, food: Manual pop-up with button release
photofileformats: NEF (RAW): 14 bit, compressed JPEG: JPEG-Baseline compliant with fine (approx. 1 : 4), normal (approx. 1 : 8), or basic (approx. 1 : 16) compression NEF (RAW)+JPEG: Single photograph recorded in both NEF (RAW) and JPEG formats
poweroptions: Rechargeable Li-ion EN-EL14 battery. Or, the EH-5b is an optional AC Adapter that can be used to power the camera from a wall outlet. When connected to the AC adapter EH-5, the EP-5A connector allows you to power the camera directly by simply inserting the power connector into the battery chamber
maximumvideoresolution: 1920 x 1080, 60i (59.94 fields/s)/ 50i (50 fields/s)*, high/normal 1920 x 1080, 30 p (progressive)/25p/24p, high/normal 1280 x 720, 60p/50p, high/normal 640 x 424, 30p/25p, high/normal Frame rates of 30p (actual frame rate 29.97 fps), 60i, and 60p (actual frame rate 59.94 fps) are available when NTSC is selected for video mode. 25p, 50i, and 50p are available when PAL is selected for video mode. Actual frame rate when 24p is selected is 23.976 fps. * Sensor output is about 60 or 50 fps
screen: Type B Briteview Clear Matte Mark VII Screen
effects: Night vision; colour sketch; miniature effect; selective colour; silhouette; high key; low key
focusing: Autofocus (AF): Single servo AF (AF-S); full-time-servo AF (AF-F) Manual focus (MF)
exposuremodes: Can be adjusted by -5 - +5 EV in increments of 1/3 or 1/2 EV in P, S, A, and M modes
opticalzoom: Approx. 0.78 x (50 mm f/1.4 lens at infinity, -1.0 m-1)
whitebalance: Auto, incandescent, fluorescent (7 types), direct sunlight, flash, cloudy, shade, preset manual, all except preset manual with fine-tuning
cleaning: Image sensor cleaning, Image Dust Off reference data (optional Capture NX 2 software required)
